allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure project into Medallion Architecture with dlt + dbt

Major Changes:
- Reorganized project into numbered folders showing data flow:
  - 0_storage: Centralized database storage (edw_prod, edw_test)
  - 1_ingestion: dlt pipeline for Jaffle Shop REST API
  - 2_transformation: dbt models (Bronze/Silver/Gold)
  - 3_serving: Future BI/API layer (placeholder)
  - 4_orchestration: Future workflow management (placeholder)

dlt Pipeline (1_ingestion):
- Load 7 tables from Jaffle Shop API: customers, orders, items, 
  products, supplies, stores, payments (mock)
- Support for environment-specific databases (test/prod)
- Fixed path calculation for centralized storage

dbt Models (2_transformation):
- Renamed staging â†’ bronze, intermediate â†’ silver, marts â†’ gold
- Bronze: 7 API source models (brz_jaffle_shop_api__*)
- Silver: 1 pivoted payments model (slv_payments__pivoted)
- Gold: 4 business models (dim_customers, dim_dates, 
  dim_payment_methods, fct_orders)
- Updated all models to use API schema (SKU-based products)
- Total: 12 models successfully running

Storage Layer (0_storage):
- Centralized DuckDB databases with environment separation
- edw_test.duckdb for development
- edw_prod.duckdb for production

Cleanup:
- Removed duplicate dbt/ and transformation/ folders
- Removed old database files from 1_ingestion
- Removed empty flows/ folder
- Updated .gitignore for dlt artifacts and databases

Documentation:
- Imported comprehensive docs from dlt-dbt-jaffle-shop
- Updated README with full project structure
- Added READMEs for each major folder
